phrase: pain starts up in the flank and radiates down to my groin
it comes and goes... depends on how much I've been drinking and activities
no blood... episode where the pain radiated to one of my testicles
pain score... 4 out of ten when it gets a little more out of control... 1 or 2 out of ten
family has had kidney stones in the past
had them before... passed some by myself and had surgery a couple times
CT scan... 0.5 cm in proximal ureter, no hydronephrosis
prescribe tramadol 50 mg for breakthrough pain
follow up in one to two weeks if still having symptoms
continue to push fluids and hopefully pass the stone
urinalysis and urine culture to rule out infection
consider lithotripsy if stone not passed by follow-up
